thread.title: Kelly Bennett

author: Kelly Bennett
title: Kelly Bennett
text: My dog Teddy has always struggled with her weight... no matter what she eats she can't put on weight... after having her tested for any health issues at the vets, which come back clear, I can't tell you how many companies I have tried that have all promised theirs were the best and the Â£'s that have been spent! When I came across Tails... I'll be honest and thought that this was just going to be another disappointment. How wrong was I! Teddy loves her food... and.... she's gained a whole lb in a month! Just fabulous and I can't recommend Tails enough... in fact.. I already have to numerous people.
